roleset.name: to ignore, turn down
roleset.note: SNUB-V NOTES: Member of VNcls judgement-33. (from snub.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: For example , one of my favorite movies is the 1949 British comedy `` Kind Hearts and Coronets , '' in which the entire comedy is based on actor Dennis Price 's murdering eight titled relatives ( all played by Alec Guinness ) because they snubbed his mother and stand in the way of his acquiring the family title .
